Chapter 8 3D Charts 8.0.1 Basic 3D Scatter Plot library(plotly) mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 0)] <- 'Automatic' mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 1)] <- 'Manual' mtcars$am <- as.factor(mtcars$am) fig <- plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~hp, z = ~qsec, color = ~am, colors = c('pink', 'blue')) fig <- fig %>% add_markers(size = 10) fig <- fig %>% layout(scene = list(xaxis = list(title = 'Weight'), yaxis = list(title = 'Gross horsepower'), zaxis = list(title = '1/4 mile time'))) fig 8.0.2 Basic 3D Surface Plot # volcano is a numeric matrix that ships with R fig <- plot_ly(z = ~volcano) fig <- fig %>% add_surface() fig
